Best clothing item I have bought off amazon! The fabric is good quality and very comfy. I own like 3 pairs of these I love them that much. Wash on a delicate cycle, would recommend air drying these! Pockets are good size and the fabric is breathable.
Nice quality! They are lined linen pants. You can definitely dress them up or down for a casual night out or a beach day. I’m super picky about material. A+ for me.
They were a little short when I got them, but I really liked them so I decided to keep them. One wash (gentle cycle, cold water, hang dry) and they shrunk so bad that they did not fit me at all.

I bought a pair of these in tan, and liked the fit and comfort of these pants so well, I bought a second pair in the lightest color. I like the idea of linen pants, but they wrinkled too esily. The lining did not fit well either. Had to send them back.

I wanted these type of linen pants for the summer and they did not dissapoint. I bought three pairs. They are warm but also breathable. Very comfortable, I could walk around all day in them. They flatter every outfit and my body. They can be a little heavy but when they are on, it feels light as it drops down. The pockets are deep and comfortable. Worth the money.

Save your money. I wanted to love these pants as I bought similar ones before from a different seller and they are amazing. The sticking in these is horrible, the waist band is sewn on flipped so if the back lays flat the sides and front are rolled in. So disappointed I was super excited for these pants especially after seeing photos and reading reviews. On top of not sitting properly on the waist due to crooked sticking of the waistband, they also don't flow very nice and are not flattering  if you have hips and the material is alot thicker and heavier then I was hoping. Keep shopping around  don't buy these

These pants are comfortable and very flowy. I sized up and I shouldn’t have because they look too baggy now, but I want to give them another try in a different size because they are amazing quality and definitely can be dressed cute or comfy with them.
The pants are nice, but a bit snug.

Must have, very comfortable, long and great material for the price.

These pants are amazing.  First, the upper part is lined so that your panty line doesn't show.  Second, they flow beautifully on your body making you feel great.  Third, they are amazingly flattering.  Fourth, they are so stylish - the texture of the material, the silver beads on the ties.  These look expensive, fashionable, and perfect for spring, summer, and fall weather.  Finally, I ordered them for same day prime delivery because I was on vacation and it was cooler than I thought at the beach.  They arrived on the same day as promised and I was able to wear them.  So, I recommend these pants 100%.  I LOVE them and plan to buy more.

These are not glared at all.  They are straight, like the “stove pipe” design.  The fabric is of very mediocre quality.  But at least they breathe.

What I expect and was described…. Though I should learn how to starch them…. I’ve pulled them straight from the dryer, ironed them, steamed them …. And they still get crinkly….. must be starched if you want to wear them out without looking slightly pajama-ish. But maybe that’s just me 🤷🏽‍♀️
Super comfortable pants! Great material. Very well made.

Loved the color!!! The dusty rose red brick type color is perfect! Length was good until you wash them. I read the reviews so I took mine to the dry cleaners and they still shrank. This is a one time wear item. Disappointing. I have them in other colors and they did not shrink.

Such a high quality pant! The material feels like high end linen. The fit is stylish and can be dressed up or down. I bought them in 4 colors!
Nice looking Pants

These pants are so cute and flattering, but they shrink *significantly* when washed. The first pair shrank three to four inches after washing, but I thought maybe it was the washing settings. These pants seem pretty high quality, but what’s the point of a nice breathable linen pant when you put a polyester lining inside?? I plan on cutting it out and hoping it’s not too see through without. They definitely will shrink in the wash so I’ll probably hand wash.
